thread.title: Travoline Adds Car Rental and Flight Booking Services Online
thread.title_full: Travoline Adds Car Rental and Flight Booking Services Online - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Travoline Adds Car Rental and Flight Booking Services Online
text:
Travoline Adds Car Rental and Flight Booking Services Online
To be a complete travel service provider Travoline adds car rental catering worldwide and flight booking services in the USA and UK becoming a one-stop travel portal.
London, United Kingdom, October 21, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Travoline, a leading Hotel Booking portal has announced the addition of Car Rental and flight booking services to become a complete travel niche partnering with world’s top travel provider. Currently the flight booking is available for US, UK and several other countries in the Asia-Pacific, whereas the car rentals are ready to book across the globe.
With the holiday season to begin and the Thanksgiving, Christmas fast approaching the customers can pre-book their car rentals, hotels at special deals and save on their travel. And this is one of the reasons, Travoline has made the car rental and flight booking services to the most visited region across the globe.
Initially, Travoline was operating the car rental portal www.autorenteurope.com separately catering only to few specific regions and now it has included the car rental along with its main portal to make it easy for travelers to book all their travel itinerary in a simple and single place.
“After experiencing a great success and welcome by the customers for the competitive rates for hotels, the initiative has been taken to add the car rentals and flights to ensure, provide complete travel solution to make it easy for our customers,” said Mrs. Nishanthi, the Managing Director of Travoline. “We have been doing fairly well in the UK markets for the hotels and expecting to target our existing customers as well as new customers in the UK region as well as travelers to the UK from any part of the world. Soon we would add more services as per the demand of our customers in the future as required,” she added.
Travoline has plans to accept even telephone bookings in the near future. However at present all the transactions are carried out online and soon once ready with their payment gateway would accept bookings via telephone, App or SMS from the major countries.
Now with Travoline, Travelers can compare and book cheap hotels and cheap car rentals worldwide. Revealing the objective, Travoline aim is to become one of the top Travel comparison portals whilst providing the reliable services at fair market prices.
For more information visit www.travoline.com
